message: Hi Bob, I have a great product available for you. I'm offering it at a competitive price right now.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. However, I was looking for a better deal. I can purchase the product for $6000.
I appreciate your interest, Bob. However, $6000 is too low for this high-value product. I can offer it to you for $22000.
Alice, I understand the value of the product, but $22000 is still too high for me. I can offer $8000.
I appreciate your effort, Bob, but I can't go that low. I can settle at $20000, which is a fair price for the quality you're getting.
Alice, I'm looking to stay within a specific budget. I can offer $10000 for the product.
Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. To meet you closer to your budget, I can offer the product for $18000. It's truly a fantastic deal.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I need to stay within my budget. I can offer $11000 for the product.
